cardText.aboveLine:
+$2
Trash this. Add an Embargo token to a Supply pile. (For the rest of the game, when a player buys a card from that pile, they gain a Curse.)

+1 Card
+1 Action
Set aside a card from your hand face down (under this). At the start of your next turn, put it into your hand.

+1 Action
Now and at the start of your next turn: +$1.
cardText.belowLine: While this is in play, when another player plays an Attack card, it doesn’t affect you.

cardText.aboveLine:
+2 Actions
Choose one: Put the top card of your deck face down on your Native Village mat (you may look at those cards at any time); or put all the cards from your mat into your hand.

+1 Card
+1 Action
Look at the bottom card of your deck. You may put it on top.
Reveal a card from your hand. Return up to 2 copies of it from your hand to the Supply. Then each other player gains a copy of it.

+2 Actions
+$1
At the start of your next turn: +1 Action and +$1.

+1 Action
Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Trash one of them. Discard one of them. Put the other one back on to your deck.
Gain a copy of a card costing up to $6 that the player to your right gained on their last turn.

+3 Cards
+1 Action
Discard 3 cards.

+1 Card
+1 Action
At the start of your next turn, +1 Card.

+$2
Each other player discards a Copper (or reveals a hand with no Copper).
Put this and a card from your hand onto your Island mat.

+$2
Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Either discard them all, or put them back in any order.

Choose one: +$1 per Coin token on your Pirate Ship mat; or each other player reveals the top 2 cards of their deck, trashes one of those Treasures that you choose, and discards the rest, and then if anyone trashed a Treasure you add a Coin token to your Pirate Ship mat.

+1 Buy
Trash a card from your hand. +$1 per $1 it costs.
Each other player discards the top card of their deck, then gains a Curse onto their deck.
Each other player discards the top card of their deck, then gains a Curse onto their deck.

+1 Card
+2 Actions
+$1.
You may reveal a Province from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold to your hand. If you don’t, gain a Silver to your hand.

+2 Cards
Each other player with 4 or more cards in hand puts cards from their hand onto their deck until they have 3 cards in hand.
Now and at the start of your next turn: +$2.
If this is the first time you played an Outpost this turn, and the previous turn wasn’t yours, then take an extra turn after this one, and you only draw 3 cards for your next hand.
If you have at least one card in hand, discard your hand, and at the start of your next turn, +5 Cards, +1 Action, and +1 Buy.

+1 Card
+1 Action
+$1
When you discard this from play, if you didn’t buy a Victory card this turn, you may put this onto your deck.
Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Cards and +1 Buy.
